lines.content: This is a project named _SoyBot_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
SoyBot helps you become a _much better_ person, __never__ again missing your deadlines!
* Adding various tasks such as deadlines and events
* Listing out all your tasks in a nice concise manner
* Save/Load feature for your task list
1. Download any of the releases from https://github.com/meerian/ip/releases
3. Refer to user guide at https://meerian.github.io/ip/

Welcome to Soy Bot, a bot that keeps track of your current tasks!
Create tasks to be added to a list.
Create unique tasks such as deadlines and todos that track unique fields such as dates.
Search for a specific task using keywords.
Automatically saves your current list that can be loaded up the next time you open the app again.
Adds a 'todo' labelled task to your list.
The list will be updated with the new task.
Now you have 1 task in the list
Adds a 'deadline' labelled task to your list.
The list will be updated with the new task.
Now you have 1 task in the list
Adds an 'event' labelled task to your list.
The list will be updated with the new task.
Now you have 1 task in the list
Deletes a task on your list.
Deletes the 2nd entry in your list.
Noted, I have removed this task:
Now you have 1 task in your list
Find a list of tasks that matches the search term.
Returns a list of tasks that contain the word 'book'.
Here are the matching tasks in your list:
Mark a task as done using a 'X'.
Marks the 1st entry in your list as done.
Nice! I have marked this task as done:
Display a brief guide on how to use Soy Bot.
Save the current list as a .txt file.
Saves the current list and close the program.
Save the current list as a .txt file and closes the program.
Bye, hope to see you again soon!

+ "This is SoyBot, a robot that helps you manage your tasks. Current version is: 1.3";
+ "You can add tasks to the list at the side."
+ "There are 3 types of tasks available: Todo, Deadline, Event.\n"
+ "Todo is a task that does not have any date attached.\n"
+ "Deadline is a task that have a deadline attached.\n"
+ "Event is a task that have a date of event attached.\n"
+ "find <text>: returns a list of tasks containing <text>";
+ "bye: saves the list and close the program";

<Label fx:id="dialog" maxHeight="1.7976931348623157E308" prefHeight="85.0" text="Label" translateY="-7.0" wrapText="true" HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS">
<ImageView fx:id="displayPicture" fitHeight="99.0" fitWidth="99.0" pickOnBounds="true" scaleX="0.7" scaleY="0.7" scaleZ="0.7" translateY="-15.0" />

<AnchorPane maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="606.0" prefWidth="627.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/16" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="MainWindow">
<ScrollPane fx:id="scrollPane" hbarPolicy="NEVER" hvalue="1.0" prefHeight="552.0" prefWidth="400.0" vvalue="1.0">
<VBox fx:id="dialogContainer" fillWidth="false" prefHeight="554.0" prefWidth="381.0" spacing="5.0" styleClass="bodybg" stylesheets="@BackgroundList.css">
<TextField fx:id="userInput" layoutY="553.0" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="52.0" prefWidth="330.0" styleClass="bodybg" stylesheets="@BackgroundTBox.css" />

<Button fx:id="listButton" alignment="CENTER" contentDisplay="RIGHT" layoutX="400.0" layoutY="553.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#displayList" prefHeight="52.0" prefWidth="226.0" style="-fx-border-color: #ced3ff;" styleClass="bodybg" stylesheets="@BackgroundTBox.css" text="Refresh List" textAlignment="CENTER" textFill="#181818" />

<Button fx:id="clearButton" layoutX="326.0" layoutY="553.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#clearList" prefHeight="26.0" prefWidth="74.0" style="-fx-border-color: #ced3ff;" styleClass="bodybg" stylesheets="@BackgroundTBox.css" text="Clear" />

<Button fx:id="sendButton" layoutX="326.0" layoutY="579.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="26.0" prefWidth="74.0" style="-fx-border-color: #ced3ff;" styleClass="bodybg" stylesheets="@BackgroundTBox.css" text="Send" />
